I can't get the pics to work in the program it only recognizes the ones I down loaded from the site after updating.  Help??
I have the same problem as drakin.

Alright, here's what I did to solve my problem.

Uninstall Dundjinni
Install Dundjinni (follow instructions above)
Start Dundjinni
Close Dundjinni
Install Update 1.01
Start Dundjinni
Close Dundjinni
Install Update 1.02
Start Dundjinni
Close Dundjinni
Install Update 1.04

I don't know if all that is necessary, but it works now when it didn't before. (Before being when I just installed all the updates directly after installing the program.)

I am getting a run error when I start the program after the initial install.

Says

"An error occured during startup.

You may have an improper installation, or invalid or missing map resources.

The program will be terminated."

WTF? Why am I getting this?

I figured it out guys...sorry...

For those with the same problem...

Just make sure you install all the patches with same keygen...

had I payed attention the first time I would have realized this....
